column1: The Purple Pig////Hummus Shakshouka - OK....this dish was a dud.  The menu described it beautifully and I thought we would actually get Shakshouka but it was pretty much de-constructed which is not how the menu described it.  We got an egg
column3: this dish was beyond not worth it and I'm surprised it is on the menu.  Do NOT waste your time/money on this.
